attributes.action: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to scrap the toll on the humber bridge for the people of lincolnshire who need to go over the bridge for medical treatment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently people have to travel from Grimsby Scunthorpe and other parts of northern Lincs for treatment at castle hill hospital cottingham yorkshire for life threatening illnesses and other treatment not available locally. The toll of over 5 pounds return is effectively a tax on the sick. Public transport is woefully poor and inadequate. scrap this toll for hospital visitors now please

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
